example: A good manager can quickly identify problems in the workflow.
Efficiently utilizing resources is key to business success.
The company plans to improve operations by upgrading technology.
New equipment has helped increase work output by 30%.
The team worked around the clock to meet the project deadline.
The new industry has created many new job opportunities.
The app provides personalized information based on user preferences.
Automation may replace some human jobs in manufacturing.
Unexpected expenses can create financial stress for families.

english: cause the misuse of personal health data
chinese: 导致个人健康数据的滥用
example: Data breaches can cause the misuse of personal health data.
Unbalanced information can develop biases in decision-making.
AI may lack emotional understanding in customer service.
Social media can sometimes lead to privacy issues if not managed well.
Excessive screen time increases dependency on technology.

english: perform tasks more swiftly and accurately
chinese: 更快、更准确地完成任务
example: Robots can perform tasks more swiftly and accurately than humans in some cases.
Outsourcing is a cost-effective solution for small businesses.
Upgrading infrastructure requires a significant investment.

english: have difficulty dealing with unexpected situations
example: Rigid systems may have difficulty dealing with unexpected situations.
The brain processes information much faster than we realize.
Organizations must adapt to change to stay competitive.
Unfair policies can bring about negative differences in society.
Digital books are taking the place of traditional paper books for many readers.

english: use something in an effective way
example: Training helps employees use equipment in an effective way.
The term cybernetics refers to the study of control systems.
User feedback helps enhance user experiences of products.
Problems are easier to solve in the early stages.
New policies have brought about a positive shift in the economy.
Teams work together to carry out tasks efficiently.
Data-driven decisions can help remove human bias.

english: reduce the need for human labor
chinese: 减少对人类劳动的需求
example: Automation reduces the need for human labor in factories.
In spite of the challenges, the team achieved great results.
Community events can improve human contact and relationships.

english: it is important to note that
example: It is important to note that not all solutions work for every situation.
Despite the fact that it rained, the outdoor event was a success.
No one is entirely immune to the effects of stress.
Leaders should factor emotion in decisions that affect employees.
Team-building activities help develop bonds with colleagues.
The plan is based on extensive market research.
This tool is meant to simplify complex tasks.

chinese: 给我们的生活增添复杂性
example: Unnecessary rules can add complexity to our lives.
People quickly become accustomed to new technologies.
Online shopping eliminates the need to visit physical stores.
People no longer need to wait in long queues for bank services.
A layer of protection is essential for sensitive data.

chinese: 更新我们的技能和知识
example: Lifelong learning helps update our skills and knowledge.

english: keep up with the rapid pace of
example: Professionals must keep up with the rapid pace of technological change.
Strong passwords help secure our digital identities.
Regular maintenance reduces the likelihood of equipment failure.
Startups aim to scale up their operations quickly.
